participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and reflective. He enjoys helping others and often thinks about the past.
participant_1.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries. i'm a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and pragmatic. She loves challenges and is always looking for her next adventure.
participant_2.background: i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing.
